{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=4 (ER-4) |asin=B078PGCGN2 |price=180 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=router |pwr_v=110-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN7130 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=SanDisk |fla1_model=SDIN7DP2-4G |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L6408EMI-12G |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63CFR-RDC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SFP |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, console port,, (RJ45),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |addl_chips=Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, PCIe 3.0 Clock Generator with 1 HCSL Outputs;Pericom;P16C557;;1;,,, DDR2/3/3L Memory Power Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS51216;;1;,,, 3A, 36V, 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT7272B;;3;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel AlphaMOS;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AON7524;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AO4566;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Unisonic Tech;UT4392G;;1;,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;2; |flags=SFP port |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.07; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.107;EdgeOS; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui_eth=FC:EC:DA }} {{TagLine|Ubiquiti EdgeMAX EdgeRouter 4 (ER-4)}} :<small>''4-Port Router with SFP/RJ45 Ports'' (ER-RMKIT - Rack 19")</small> :[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-4/ Product page] {{•}} [https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/categories/200321064-EdgeMAX Support page] {{•}} [https://www.ubnt.com/downloads/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_ER-4_DS.pdf Datasheet]
===Model Comparison=== :[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/comparison/ EdgeMAX Model Comparison] *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 4 (ER-4)]] - e300 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7130 @1GHz ''Octeon III'' (Quad Core MIPS64) :Ports: 3x GbE, 1x SFP, 1x USB 3.0; Performance: 3.4Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 6P (ER-6P)]] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7130 @1GHz ''Octeon III'' (Quad Core MIPS64) :Ports: 5x GbE, 1x SFP, 1x USB 3.0; Performance: 3.4Mpps :PoE Support: 5x 24V passive 2-pair/4-pair PoE *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter PRO]] (ERPro-8)/(ER-8) - e200 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN6120 @1GHz ''Octeon II'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: (6+2)x GbE, 2x SFP, 1x USB 2.0; Performance: 1.8Mpps :*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter (ER-8)]] - e200 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter LITE]] (ERLite-3) - e110 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5020 @500MHz ''Octeon +'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: 3x GbE, 1x USB 2.0, Console; Performance: 0.7Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter POE]] (ERPoe-5) - e110 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5020 @500MHz ''Octeon +'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: 5x GbE, 1x USB 2.0, Console; Performance: 0.7Mpps :PoE Support: 5x 24V/48V/Passive 2-pair/4-pair PoE :*[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Security Gateway (USG)]] - e100 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X]] (ER-X)/(ER-X-SFP) - e50 :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz (Dual Core MIPS1004KEc) :Ports: 5x GbE, 2x PoE (in/out), (1x SFP); Performance: 1.4Mpps :*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X SFP]] (ER-X-SFP) - e50 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Infinity (ER-8-XG)]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-infinity/ PPage] :CPU: [[Cavium]] [https://cavium.com/octeon-III-CN73XX-CN72XX-mips64-processors.html CN7360] @1.8GHz ''Octeon III'' (16x Core MIPS64) :8-Port 10G SFP+ Router (80Gbps), 4GB Flash, 16GB DDR4 RAM :Ports: 1x GbE, 8x SFP, 1x USB 3.0, Console; Performance: 18Mpps
